Reviews.Title: Great for cameras
Reviews.Author: S. Watson
Reviews.Content: Bought this to see if it would work for a camera; fits perfectly and the magnet's real strong, looks like it'll hold any light-medium weight camera well on metal surfaces!

Reviews.Title: Super strong
Reviews.Author: T. Bush
Reviews.Content: This magnet base is super strong. In fact, you may have trouble pulling it off of a refrigerator. Bit since it's holding your camera, that's a good thing.

ProductInfo.Features:
Magnet holds up to 5 lbs. (2.3kg) in a vertical pull. Base is 2.75-Inch (69.8mm) in diameter and 0.385-Inch (9.8mm) thick
0.25-Inch 20 mounting stud
ProductInfo.Name: Panavise 864 CCTV Magnet Base (Black)
